definition: end/extremity/item/port/to hold sth level with both hands/to carry/regular

sentences.english: The boss kept back 100 dollars from his salary for nothing.
sentences.chinese: 老板无端地从他的薪水中扣去了100美元。

sentences.english: Those carpers who blame Yao without any reasonable evidences are somehow mentally abnormal.
sentences.chinese: 那些无端攻击姚明的中国球迷的心态是一种变态心理。

sentences.english: Qi and blood in the meridians circulate in cycles.
sentences.chinese: 经脉中的气血运行是循环贯注的，如环无端。

sentences.english: He lugged a story into our conversation.
sentences.chinese: 他无端把一件事扯进我们谈话中。

sentences.english: Epilepsy is defined by two or more unprovoked seizures.
sentences.chinese: 癫痫是指两次或两次以上的无端发作。

sentences.english: The first sign that you’re successfully breaking out of mediocracy is feeling unwarranted fear.
sentences.chinese: 当你成功摆脱平庸的第一个符号就是感到无端的恐惧。

sentences.english: The fling abuses otiose of for no reason, the hope can have the voice of more reason.
sentences.chinese: 无端的谩骂没有用的，希望能有更多理性的声音。

sentences.english: Being humiliated for no justified reason, we would think of death.
sentences.chinese: 被他人无端地羞辱，我们会痛不欲生。

sentences.english: All it says is vacuum won't naturally occure.
sentences.chinese: 只是说真空不能无端地发生。

sentences.english: Thoughts of entanglement, unprovoked will cause many inexplicable mind.
sentences.chinese: 思绪纠缠，无端的会惹起许多莫名的心思。

sentences.english: This is a highly irresponsible and unfounded accusation in disregard of the facts.
sentences.chinese: 欧洲议会罔顾事实，妄加评论，无端指责，极不负责。

sentences.english: China does not accept the Philippines unwarranted accusations.
sentences.chinese: 中方不接受菲方的无端指责。

sentences.english: A clear conscience laughs at false accusation.
sentences.chinese: 只要问心无愧，无端指责可一笑置之。

sentences.english: Her salary was cut short by her boss without any excuse.
sentences.chinese: 她的工资无端被老板克扣。

sentences.english: Relevant accusation is thus not acceptable.
sentences.chinese: 因此，该组织对中国的无端指责是不可接受的。

definition: no cause, no reason (idiom); completely uncalled for
to feel hatred/to harbor a grudge
to make trouble out of nothing

pinyin: yi1 er2 zai4 , zai4 er2 san1
